answerText: Pitch Black[10] Riddick was played by this bald actor that has starred alongside Paul Walker in most of the Fast and the Furious movies.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Penn | 14 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Keith David plays a Muslim Imam in this movie, and is one of the few survivors of the crash of the Hunter-Gratzner.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this 2000 sci-fi horror film, in which a ship carrying the criminal Riddick lands on a desert planet inhabited by flesh-eating monsters that only come out at night.
